column3: ## Journal with Last Full Review date

To prepare for this test, ensure that a journal is publicly available in DOAJ with a Last Full Review date set in the past. You can use the testdrive setup linked here if none are available

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//testdrive/publisher_with_journal

Search for the above journal on the public search page (e.g. by the identifier provided by the testdrive)

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//search/journals
click the journal title to go to the ToC page

column4: At the bottom of the ToC page is a "Last Full Review" date, showing the date set in the journal record.
